t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Vycor Plus Self-Adhering Flashing - 4" x 75' 1 Roll
s: This is the second brand of joist tape I have used in my deck renovation - the first was the DeckWise product. Grace Vycor Plus is the clear winner between the two. It is thinner, by perhaps half, so it is much easier to work with. Also, it's wider - 4" vs 3" - that makes it stick better to ...

s: I used this product to flash a new deck ledger after tearing down the old rotten deck.
